article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: Israeli  forces  have  killed  at  least  10  Palestinians  in  the  occupied  West  Bank,  according  to  the  Palestinian  health  ministry.

article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: The  local  health  ministry  says  at  least  600  Palestinians  -  members  of  armed  groups,  attackers  and  civilians  -  have  been  killed  in  conflict-related  incidents  in  the  West  Bank,  including  East  Jerusalem.

article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: At  least  17  Israelis,  including  12  security  forces  personnel,  have  also  been  killed  in  the  West  Bank,  according  to  a  UN  tally.

article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: Locals  say  that  a  boy  of  14  was  among  four  killed  after  a  dawn  raid  by  Israeli  forces  resulted  in  violent  confrontations.

article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: Meanwhile,  in  Jenin  -  a  regular  flashpoint  -  an  Israeli  aircraft  attacked  what  the  Israeli  military  described  as  “terrorist  cells”  killing  at  least  five.

article_title: Ten Palestinians dead in West Bank violence
sentence: In  the  south  of  the  territory,  a  Palestinian  was  killed  after  allegedly  stabbing  an  Israeli  soldier  in  Beit  Jala,  at  a  main  checkpoint  on  a  road  to  Jerusalem.
